title: section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Statistics)
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Statistics) 

(Intra-Union Trade in Goods) (Amendment) Regulations 2024. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 1 January 2025.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited european union (statistics) (intra-union trade goods) (amendment) regulation 2024 (2) regulation come operation 1 january 2025

title: section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27 of 1972) and for the
heading: 2. The European Union (Statistics) (Intra-Union Trade
text_raw:
2. The European Union (Statistics) (Intra-Union Trade 

in Goods) 

Regulations 2024 (S.I. No. 396 of 2024) are amended in Regulation 3(1) - 

(a) 

(b) 

in subparagraph (a), by the substitution of “€750,000” for 
“€635,000”, and 

in subparagraph (b), by the substitution of “€750,000” for 
“€500,000”. 

GIVEN under the Official Seal, 

6 December, 2024. 

SIMON HARRIS, 

Taoiseach. 

1 OJ No. L 327, 17.12.2019, p.1. 
2 OJ No. L 339, 24.9.2021, p. 33. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 13th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [686] 3
